title: Compare Metternich and Bismarck's goal, achvmts

content.question:
Directions: The suggest writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. 

Compare and contrast the foreign policy goals and achievements of Metternich (1815-1848) and Bismarck (1862-1890).

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
